Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE LUNG CANCER-TARGETED GENE PANEL WITH REARRANGEMENT, TUMOR
Purpose: Comprehensive genetic test to identify actionable mutations, rearrangements, and gene amplifications associated with lung cancer.
Equipment: Next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, Qubit Fluorometer, Agilent 2200 TapeStation
